summary: This document is a trading authorization form from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, allowing an agent to buy, sell, and trade securities on behalf of the undersigned. It outlines the responsibilities and indemnities associated with the trading activities conducted by the agent.
keyFacts: The document is a trading authorization limited to purchases and sales of securities.
The undersigned authorizes an agent to act on their behalf for trading activities.
The authorization includes indemnification for losses arising from the transactions.
The authorization is a continuing one until revoked by the undersigned.
The document references Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. as the firm conducting the securities activities.
